item.description:
*** Tickets are about 80% Sold***

If you have had enough of winter and are ready for another great Wine Tasting from Boston Uncorked purchase your tickets now. Last months event was cancelled due to weather conditions so this one should fill up fast.

The event will takee from 7:00 - 9:00 PM at Morton's Steak House at 699 Boylston Street in the Back Bay. Members from my Red Sox Natives and Cathy's Boston Wine groups will also be joining us.

Boston Uncorked invites you to join them for Winter Warm-Up 3 as it is just the right recipe to enjoy copious wines and hors d'oeuvres, be warm and cozy with great people in this warm and cozy atmosphere.

Grab a glass, grab a plate, grab a couch and grab some gab with equally warm people. There is no better way to stay warm on this Wednesday night in Boston.

Tickets are $39.00 per person. There are no Maybe RSVPs since you must purchase a ticket in advance.

To purchase your ticket go to www.bostonuncorked.com . Please do not call or contact Morton's.
item.how_to_find_us: We will E Mail those who have purchased tickets before the event.
item.why: The Holiday Party was a winner. Several requested that we attend another Uncorked event.
item.name: Winter Warm-Up 3 Wine Tasting with Boston Uncorked at Morton's Back Bay
